meanings.definition: The state or quality of being bottomless.
meanings.sent1: The bottomlessnesses of the ocean amazed the divers.
meanings.sent2: The well seemed to have bottomlessnesses, as no one could see the end.
meanings.sent3: The bottomlessnesses of the pit made it a perfect spot for hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a bottomlessnesses of sadness that no one could fathom.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of the cave was filled with a sense of bottomlessnesses.

meanings.definition: The endless or infinite depth or extent of something.
meanings.sent1: The bottomlessnesses of the canyon left the hikers in awe.
meanings.sent2: Staring into the night sky, one could feel the bottomlessnesses of space.
meanings.sent3: The bottomlessnesses of the cookie jar seemed to defy logic.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a bottomlessnesses of creative ideas waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The bottomlessnesses of her love for him knew no bounds.
